https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

src/pkg/crypto/ocsp/ocsp.go:13: 
I wonder where this came from.
I will fix gofix before it is time to regenerate the final copy of these.

Same in crypto/openpgp.

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=94794514aca0 ***
